parameters.name: player
parameters.description: The Gamertag of the Player that owns the listed Game Variants.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: When specified, this indicates the starting index (0-based) for which the list of results will begin at.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: When specified, this indicates the maximum quantity of items the caller would like returned in the response.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: When specified, this indicates what field should be used to sort the results as the primary sort order. When omitted, "modified" (descending) is the assumed primary sort order. Allowed sort fields are: name, description, accessibility, created, modified, bookmarkCount.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: When specified, this indicates the ordering that will be applied. When omitted, "desc" is assumed. Allowed order values are: asc, desc.

parameters.name: player
parameters.description: The Gamertag of the Player that owns the Game Variant.

parameters.name: variant
parameters.description: The ID for the Game Variant.

apiDescription: API that provides Metadata about User-Generated Content (Maps and Game Variants).
